description:
With over 3,000,000 books published in the U.S every year it's easy for your book to get lost in the crowd.

Today, a book trailer is necessary for marketing your book.

This course will teach you how to make a professional book trailer .

Getting a book trailer produced professionally can costs hundreds of dollars.

I will walk you through everything you will need to produce your own professional looking book trailer. And best of all you can save hundreds of dollars by doing it yourself.

We will go over the entire process.

We will use Windows Live Movie Maker to make our trailer.

Follow along as we use live video capture to instruct you on how to use Audacity and WLMM.

By the end of the course you will have the tools to make a professional book trailer and other video productions.

You will leave the course with a new skill that you can use to make videos.

If you are ready to learn a new skill,save money and have some fun let's get started. Sign up for the course now.

Included in the supplemental materials section of the lesson you will find:

  • A zipped file of 70 royalty free music clips you can use for whatever you want.
  • PDFs of sources of royalty free photos and images.
  • PDFs of sources of royalty free music.
  • PDFs of sources of royalty free video clips.
  • An Audacity manual as a downloadable PDF
  • PDF of video submission sites.
  • PDF of authors' sites.
  • PDF of video software tools.
title: How To Make a Book Trailer
